article_node.title: I’ve had grim Mounjaro side effects - I get fart explosions & my breath stinks
article_node.summary: A mother posted a TikTok video detailing severe gastrointestinal side effects—bad breath, foul burps, and constant flatulence—after her fifth injection of the weight‑loss drug Mounjaro (tirzepatide). The article notes that Mounjaro, a GLP‑1 receptor agonist, is gaining popularity for rapid weight loss but has been linked to serious complications, including pancreatitis and a handful of suspected drug‑related deaths in the UK. It also highlights growing private prescriptions and the potential NHS rollout, while other users echo similar adverse reactions, underscoring concerns over safety and regulatory oversight.
